title: When Making Mistakes Means Things Aren't Working
itunes:title: When Making Mistakes Means Things Aren't Working
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

So many times my clients think that making diet mistakes means they are failures. They're not! Making mistakes while you're dieting means you're DOING something. If you didn't follow your plan, that means you had a plan!

The key to being okay with mistakes is using them to learn. In this podcast, I talk about how to make mistakes mean that you are moving forward, not moving in reverse.
